snippet: Demonstrators faced off with riot officers overnight after the police shot and killed Keith L. Scott while trying to serve an arrest warrant on someone else....
abstract: Demonstrators face off with riot police in Charlotte, NC, after police shoot and kill Keith L Scott, who is black and whose family says he was unarmed, while serving warrant on another person.
lead_paragraph: Demonstrators faced off with riot officers overnight after the police shot and killed Keith L. Scott while trying to serve an arrest warrant on someone else.

headline.main: Protests Erupt in Charlotte After Police Kill a Black Man
headline.print_headline: Police Shooting Sets Off Protest in Charlotte
